kDesc
That cane carries a sapphire as big as a cricket ball! [#Legal]
Cette canne est ornée d'un saphir gros comme une balle de tennis ! [#Legal]
Auf diesem Stock ist ein Saphir von der Größe eines Tennisballs. [#Legal]
Questo bastone ha uno zaffiro grande quanto una palla da cricket! [#Legal]
¡Este bastón lleva un zafiro tan grande como una pelota de tenis! [#Legal]
야구공 만큼이나 커다란 사파이어랍니다! [#Legal]
That cane carries a sapphire as big as a baseball! [#Legal]
這支權杖鑲有一顆如棒球般大的藍寶石。 [#Legal]
這支權杖鑲有一顆如棒球般大的藍寶石。 [#Legal]
That cane carries a sapphire as big as a baseball! [#Legal]
